title: How Can I Get Google Pixel As A Gift , I've Searched All My Country And I Haven't Found Anything
content:
Hi Google
I'm A Huge Fan Of You And Hope To Join You But I'm ain Syria
In A While I've Tried To Buy Google Pixel 4 but there's No Suppliers In Syria
Can You Please Help Me Have The Google Pixel 4 Or If You Making A Gifts From Any Payments I can Pay , Also
I need Your Help To Let Me Join The Team Will Someone help me
I really Dream Of Google Work please Help Me
So I can work and Buy and be updated with the latest Google Devices
I'll give my life to Google the great Awesome company

Please help as soon as possible
